newsitem.title: USA: Metromedia to face layoffs if MGM buys it - report.
newsitem.headline: Metromedia to face layoffs if MGM buys it - report.

text.p: Senior executives at Metromedia Entertainment have told staff in several departments to expect major layoffs if an acquisition deal is struck with Metro Goldwyn Mayer Inc, Daily Variety said.

Metromedia is said to be in talks with Metro Goldwyn and its primary backer, billionaire investor Kirk Kerkorian, regarding the sale of Metromedia's film library to MGM, according to sources familiar with the negotiations.
These sources say they believe MGM and Kerkorian have made a preliminary bid just above $300 million for Metromedia's 2,200-title catalog.
